verbs.description: [ARG1: rocky river resident] [V: appointed] [ARG2: to top board position] [ARGM-PRD: with special olympics ohio] the board of directors of special olympics ohio sooh has unanimously voted their approval of nominee rocky river resident bill meerman for the office of chairperson jessica stewart lena john wysocki vp of marketing development university hospitals president and ceo rocky river ohio bill meerman american red cross development board linda gandee special rocky river wells fargo advisors ohio rocky river high school board of directors
